short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save and manage (WordPress) code snippets with titles and tags.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
As a web developer or WordPress developer, you're always looking for ways to work more efficiently and effectively. The Code Snippet Libary is designed to do just that by allowing you to quickly and easily manage and apply code snippets right from your browser.

Why Code Snippet Extension?
Code Snippet Extension provides seamless integration with your development workflow, saving you valuable time and allowing you to keep your focus on creating a great user experience on your websites. With this tool, you have direct access to your own library of commonly used and custom code snippets that you can copy with one click.

Key features:
* Quick access to snippets: simply and quickly manage all your code snippets directly and tag them so you can find them quickly and easily. With a click on the snippet you instantly copy the corresponding code so you can quickly implement it.
* Easy snippet customization and storage: Customize existing snippets or add new ones according to your preference. Store them securely in the extension for future use.
* User-friendly interface: The extension is designed with ease of use in mind. Whether you are a beginner or an expert, you will have no trouble finding and using the necessary features.

The Code Snippet Extension is a must-have for anyone who regularly works with web development or website management.
